description:
Now you've been generous with your memories and we'll be sharing some of them. But first, with me in the studio is Adam Rutherford, geneticist, presenter of Inside Science and science fiction enthusiast. So Adam, can you recall when, where, how you first saw Star Wars?

I can. It's something of a family legend. I don't think it's a myth, I think it's true, and it is one of my earliest memories of all is being in the cinema seeing Star Wars. We think it occurred in 1979 when I was four. We think that I might have been to the cinema to see the Cat from Outer Space before that, but I have no recollection of that. But it is right there. I think you've got one of the best entrances in all cinema history. I think my favourite of all time is Orson Welles in the Third Man and I know that's not particularly controversial. But when you see Darth Vader come through those doors for the first time flanked by the storm troopers who will sort of stand to attention, and this personification of such evil appears for the first time and you know, within minutes, he's crushing the throat of some lackey, shouting at princess Leia, you know, that age was five or six, or eight, however old you are, that's pretty potent stuff.

声明：音视频均来自互联网链接，仅供学习使用。本网站自身不存储、控制、修改被链接的内容。“沪江英语”高度重视知识产权保护。当如发现本网站发布的信息包含有侵犯其著作权的链接内容时，请联系我们，我们将依法采取措施移除相关内容或屏蔽相关链接。>>零基础直达流利生活口语班<<

title: 星球大战（有声）

description:
《英文天天写》是沪江社团一档写作类社刊，其目的在于提升大家的英语写作能力。每期节目主持人都会给出一个话题，积极参加的童鞋还会得到主持人的专业点评哦！想提高英语写作的童鞋千万不要错过哦！去沪江社团订阅本社刊！

               

话题：

Writing: imagine a scenario or express your opinion
Clearance
Clearance means increasing space. What is the clearance? Where does it happen? What will be the outcome?
This week's topic: They needed clearance... (90-110 words)

Suggestions:
1) security clearance
2) clearance sale
3) clearance between buildings
4) clearance requirement
5) Instead of writing a scenario, feel free to comment on the story below.

范例1：

Besides, why him? Of course he was a leader of a team and his position was by no means low in the corporate ladder. Still, there were a lot more people higher up and more important than him, along with a higher security clearance. Without a doubt, there were proprietary information and corporation information that Sean had access to, but as far as he knew, it was nothing too secretive, not to mention they were nowhere near any major breakthrough. For a very brief moment, Sean thought of alerting security.

想要得到专业主持人的点评和意见吗？快来节目现场一试身手吧>>
